heroSubtitle: Free guides, checklists, and tools to help you manage IT and security
intro: We believe in sharing knowledge. These resources are free to download and use â€” whether you're a client or not. If you find them helpful, we'd love to hear from you.

resources.title: Cyber Security Checklist for Irish SMEs
resources.description: A practical one-page checklist covering the essential security measures every Irish SME should have in place. Perfect for a quick self-assessment or board presentation.

resources.title: IT Disaster Preparedness Checklist
resources.description: Are you ready if disaster strikes? This checklist helps you assess your backup, recovery, and business continuity readiness. Hand it to management to start the conversation.

resources.title: Password Policy Template
resources.description: A ready-to-use password policy document for your organisation. Covers complexity requirements, MFA, password managers, and handling of shared credentials.

resources.title: Incident Response Plan Template
resources.description: A framework for documenting how your organisation will respond to security incidents. Includes roles, communication plans, and post-incident review processes.

resources.title: IT Budget Planning Template
resources.description: A comprehensive Excel template for planning your annual IT budget. Includes categories for hardware, software, services, and contingency. Pre-filled with typical SME line items.

resources.title: MSP Vendor Evaluation Scorecard
resources.description: Comparing managed service providers? Use this scorecard to objectively evaluate and compare vendors across key criteria like support, security, and pricing.

resources.title: New Employee IT Onboarding Checklist
resources.description: Ensure new starters have everything they need from day one. This checklist covers accounts, equipment, access, and security training requirements.

resources.title: Microsoft 365 Security Hardening Guide
resources.description: Step-by-step guide to securing your Microsoft 365 tenant. Covers conditional access, MFA enforcement, email security, and SharePoint permissions.

resources.title: Backup Testing Procedures Guide
resources.description: Your backups are only as good as your last successful restore. This guide covers how to properly test backups and document results for compliance.

cta.title: Need Help Implementing These?
cta.description: These resources are a great starting point, but implementing them properly takes expertise. We're here to help.
